name: Pixel Rope Swing Star Sequel
description:
Choose your skins and go swing across the world! Simple game that is loved by many!

The game is easy, grab the buildings with the rope and swing as far as you can. There are multiple cities, characters, and game styles to try out. Don't be fooled, the game may sound easy but it is harder than it looks. See how high you can score!

FEATURES:
- Universal app, play in HD on any iOS device, including iPads
- Tight and fast paced gameplay
- Realistic physic engine for the player, ropes and objects
- Play during the day or at night
- Choose your player skin, choose the cities and ropes 
- Destructible ragdoll effects
- Various objects to rope to like birds or planes 
- Endless playing in never ending cities 
- Directly compare yourself against all other players or your friends
- Supports GameCenter. Play against MC Players around the world!


****DOWNLOAD NOW FOR FREE****
